author: Reuters Editorial
title: Schroders boardroom reshuffle sees Philip Howard step down​
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Schroders Plc:
* ‍LORD HOWARD OF PENRITH, HAVING SERVED ON BOARD FOR MORE THAN NINE YEARS, WILL STEP DOWN FROM BOARD AT CONCLUSION OF 2018 ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING ON 26 APRIL 2018.​
* ‍IAN KING WILL SUCCEED PHILIP HOWARD AS SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR.​
* ‍NICHOLA PEASE, WHO JOINED BOARD AS AN INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IN SEPTEMBER 2012, WILL SUCCEED PHILIP HOWARD AS CHAIRMAN OF REMUNERATION COMMITTEE.​ Source text for Eikon: (Reporting By Sinead Cruise)
